## About Me

I am an aspiring PhD researcher with interests in **urban development, housing policy, and the application of AI and machine learning to climate-resilient real estate and urban systems**.

My research focuses on how data-driven and interpretable machine-learning models can support more equitable and climate-resilient urban planning and investment decisions.

## Research Interests

- Climate-Resilient Urban Development  
- Housing Affordability and Real Estate Markets  
- Interpretable Machine Learning for Policy Analysis  
- Urban Data Science and Spatial Analytics  

## Current Focus

I am currently developing research ideas around **AI-enabled housing affordability modeling and climate risk assessment**, with an emphasis on policy-relevant and equity-aware frameworks.
